Description: Return the given string optionally formatted as a Header.
Notes: If no Header switch is provided, the default is no formatting.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Get-HelpModuleData build-docs | New-HelpDoc | Add-HelpDocText -Text "My Module Help" -H1 | Out-HelpDoc
# My Module Help
Add a level 1 header with the text "My Module Help".
